review: We love this Fire Stick. We already owned the Fire TV and wanted something for our bedroom. The Stick works just as well as the Fire TV as far as what I use it for. This serves as a interface for TVs without SmartTV technology whether they're old or just don't come with it. All you need is a HDMI port and a power source. We are currently trying to decide if we should get another Stick for our guest room/study or get another Fire TV for our room and move the Stick to the other room. Either way, both products are great for anyone looking to "Cut the cord" on cable/satellite. You can't go wrong with Amazon products; I'm convinced.

review: Although, I have almost always had good experiences with shopping on Amazon, This fire stick came with poor directions. Myself, and two other people more familiar with setting up electronics, spent several hours trying to get it to work.  We read all of the online help directions and nothing worked.  We also couldn't read the ID on the fire stick because it is less than 4 point type and printed in black on black--a really stupid design mistake. Amazon is NOT Apple--and that is a good thing.  Amazon is usually good in anticipating consumer needs, but this one is a loser.
author: Mary Jane Zander
